aboutUs.breadcrumbSubtitle: Building homes also for the generations to come.
aboutUs.section1.title: About Ecobuild System Ltd.
aboutUs.section1.p1: What if building smarter, stronger, and greener homes was not just possible—but proven? Ecobuild is proud to lead that revolution in Israel and beyond. In response to a public call issued by the Government of Israel—an initiative led by then Minister of Finance Moshe Kahlon and Minister of Construction and Housing Yoav Galant—for the participation of innovative companies and entrepreneurs to help address the housing crisis in Israel, I took on the challenge and decided to embark on a personal and meaningful journey, driven by a national mission: to introduce a new, advanced, reliable, and efficient construction method that could transform the Israeli construction industry.
aboutUs.section1.p2: I embarked on a global search, visiting 8 countries and reviewing 11 advanced building systems. After extensive consultation with architects, contractors, and engineers, I found one solution that stood out: NUDURA ICF. Examining eleven different construction methods in depth, speaking with engineers, contractors, architects, and manufacturers, and learning the advantages, disadvantages, and adaptability of each method to Israel's climate, regulations, and construction culture. After thorough evaluations, one method stood out clearly in every parameter—the insulated concrete formwork (ICF) system by NUDURA from Canada.
aboutUs.section1.p3: The decision to choose NUDURA technology was complex and in-depth. I assessed every method from every possible angle—from production and transportation costs to ease and speed of installation, as well as long-term thermal and acoustic performance. I examined the suitability of each method for Israel's challenging climate, local regulatory limitations, and end-user expectations.
aboutUs.section1.p4: When I arrived at NUDURA's manufacturing facilities in Canada, I immediately understood that I had found the ideal solution to Israel's construction challenges. NUDURA combines rapid construction, military-grade durability, and energy savings of up to 72%—all in one system. Structural strength and durability, excellent thermal performance, and architectural flexibility—all at a competitive cost and with an exceptionally high level of reliability.
aboutUs.section1.p5: This led to the founding of Ecobuild and its establishment as the exclusive importer and distributor of NUDURA in Israel and additional countries. Since Ecobuild's founding, we have led hundreds of projects across the country—from private homes to public buildings and entire residential complexes. In every project, we see remarkable results: buildings that meet the world's most advanced green building standards, significant energy cost savings, exceptional climate comfort, and high user satisfaction.
aboutUs.founderSection.title: About the company's founder - Doron Aroussi
aboutUs.founderSection.p1: My vision has always been simple and clear: to implement in Israel the best the world has to offer in construction technology, and to make that technology accessible, reliable, and proven for improving the quality of life for citizens, contractors, developers, and the environment as a whole.
aboutUs.founderSection.p2: I believe the future belongs to smart, efficient, and green construction. My mission is to continue leading the construction revolution in Israel, to implement new standards of quality and sustainability, and to bring the most advanced technologies to every construction project in the country.
aboutUs.founderSection.p3: Ecobuild is at the forefront of Israel's green building revolution with NUDURA's world-leading construction technology.
aboutUs.benefits.fastConstruction.title: Fast Construction
aboutUs.benefits.fastConstruction.text: Significant reduction in construction time—by dozens of percentage points—compared to traditional building methods.
aboutUs.benefits.structuralDurability.te: Exceptional resistance to earthquakes, fire, moisture, and extreme weather conditions.
aboutUs.benefits.energyEfficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
aboutUs.benefits.energyEfficiency.text: Revolutionary thermal insulation that provides up to 72% savings in energy costs.
aboutUs.benefits.globalStandards.title: Global Standards Compliance
aboutUs.benefits.globalStandards.text: Meets stringent standards in Israel, Europe, the U.S. (civilian and military), and Canada.
aboutUs.benefits.greenBuilding.title: Green Building
aboutUs.benefits.greenBuilding.text: Clean and precise construction processes with a dramatic reduction in construction waste.
aboutUs.benefits.architecturalFlexibilit: Freedom in design - curved walls, oversized windows, high ceilings.
aboutUs.cta.title: Explore our projects. Partner with us. Let's build the future—together.

academy.breadcrumb.title: Ecobuild College
academy.breadcrumb.subtitle: Building homes also for the generations to come.
academy.cards.instructionBook: Participants will receive an instruction book (Hebrew) “Installer's Guide,” a notebook and writing instruments.
academy.cards.courseCost: The cost of the course is 400 NIS, but at this stage it will be provided free of charge until further notice.
academy.cards.courseHours: Course hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. A light lunch will be served and hot drinks are available throughout the day.
academy.cards.registration: To register, contact an authorized distributor. Or use the Contact Subject form to register for the course.
academy.important.title: Important information
academy.important.text: NUDURA or Ecobuild shall not be liable for any general, special, direct or indirect damages, including bodily injury, which may be caused to any person, including but not limited to any installer, contractor, architect, engineer, and/or property owner as a result of the installation or assembly of NUDURA or Ecobuild products that have not been installed in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions provided by Ecobuild. NUDURA or Ecobuild reserves the right to cancel a class or the start of a course for any reason at the sole discretion of Ecobuild management.

articles.breadcrumb.title: Articles and articles
articles.breadcrumb.subtitle: Building homes also for the generations to come.
articles.section1.title: Articles and articles
articles.section1.description1:
GreenNest Eco House
NUDURA, a leading manufacturer of insulated concrete forms, is proud to be participating in HTCs GreenNest Eco House project. The GreenNest building was submitted by the Higher College of Technology to Oman's first Eco House design competition, which was held under the auspices of the Oman Research Bureau. Continuing the principality's long-term policy of promoting energy conservation, sustainability and renewable energy, the Research Bureau seeks to challenge Oman's youth to develop their skills and abilities in these areas. The competition calls for the construction of a home that is livable, energy efficient, environmentally friendly and has a marketable architectural design and planning.
articles.section1.description2: GreenNest won first place in the Oman Eco House design competition. Click on the links below to learn more about this project or view the data.
articles.section2.title: GreenNest in the news:
articles.section2.news1: Muscat Daily: HCT wins Eco House competition
articles.section2.news2: Inhabitat: An extraordinary villa: uses 100% solar energy.
articles.section2.news3: CNN Arabic: Is this the best house in Oman?
articles.section2.news4: Contractor Carillon Alawi wins Sustainability Initiative of the Year award for 201
articles.section3.title: Corley House
articles.section3.description: NUDURAs ICF project, the Coralley House, was named the winner of the Residential New Construction category in the 2014 Greenbuild Competition. The competition celebrates environmentally friendly projects and products in the construction industry. Judge Dr. Kerry Ashford, CEO of the National Energy Foundation, explained the importance of the Greenbuild Competition. Journalist David Derbyshire moderated the event. “The Coralley House is an outstanding example of how energy-efficient architecture doesn't have to be constrained by design constraints or conventional thinking,” said designer Jake White of Ecotecture. “This elegant and contemporary home, which meets the family's design aspirations, is located within a national park in an area of outstanding natural beauty and uses very little fossil fuel and the national grid. It is the most complex design that Ecotecture architects have ever designed.”
articles.section3.readMore: Read the full story on the Coralley House
belowConstructionSlope.breadcrumbSubtitl: Building homes also for the generations to come.
belowConstructionSlope.sectionDescriptio: This section covers below-grade construction details that apply to all building types, for either Combustible or Non-Combustible Construction classifications. It includes general information to consider when working with Nudura in both plan and vertical section layout including;
belowConstructionSlope.point3: Considerations for the use of Brick Ledge Forms and Scribing to Rock
belowConstructionSlope.detailPoint1: Strip Footings for both basement/garage slabs installed below grade and stem wall configurations
belowConstructionSlope.detailPoint2: Grade Beams supporting below grade for either slab or stem wall interface
belowConstructionSlope.detailPoint3: Haunched or thickened edge slab on grade construction

bimLibrary.title: BIM Library
bimLibrary.subtitle: Building homes also for the generations to come.
bimLibrary.heading: BIM Library
bimLibrary.description1: Our Building Information Modeling (BIM) Library helps design professionals in the first stages of a project when working with building design software.
bimLibrary.description2: Created to work with Autodesk Revit building design software, these files show how to use Nudura for a variety of wall types. Use the 3D models to play and experiment with the geometry of Nudura forms to achieve any view you need without leaving the comfort of your office. The project and template files even let you transfer the Nudura wall types into your existing building projects.

technicalRequirements.title: Technical Requirements
technicalRequirements.body: If you don't have Autodesk Revit, you can view the files by downloading a free copy of the Autodesk Design Review software, which has many features for viewing the Nudura 3D form unit profiles. Simply use the .dwf files to view our form lineup in 3D. Note that, due to file size, these models/families are intended for viewing purposes only and not for assembly within a project.
